characteristic.name: Sedentary Interval Notification
characteristic.description:
The Sedentary Interval Notification characteristic is used to represent the sedentary interval notification of a user. The sedentary interval notification is the sedentary time interval after which a user wants to be notified.
The structure of this characteristic is defined below.

fields.name: Sedentary Interval Notification
fields.description: A value of 0x0000 in the Sedentary Interval Notification field represents that the user does not want to be notified about sedentary intervals.
